extendedInfo.description: Free version also available with ads and less features. Features: - Option to lock Xs and Os in place when drawing. - Undo of last 10 drawings.Pay version: - Save and load boards. - Change rinks. - No ads. - Share Image of board via email, message, bluetooth, etc...v1.5: Share Play Image

reviews.comment: Excellent for what it is. Could use some new features, but it works well as is. Can\'t wait for Android pad for this app.
reviews.author: A Google User
